attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Reopen wards at Sandwell Hospital West Bromwich West Midlands.It as only just been rebuilt after some idiot set fire to it costing millions.They also want to now close it and  build another one in the next town.What a waste of money when this could go towards medical stuff thats needed like more nurses.

rejection.details: The title of a petition cannot be your name and address.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
